description:
The QUSD token is a low-volatility coin meaning that it is never supposed to change significantly in value. This is thanks to coins always only being sold at a certain amount, which motivates buyers to not sell for less. Therefore, QUSD tokens are good for value preservation. The main difference between QUSD tokens and competitors such as USDT, is that QUSD is issued by a reputable company from a reputable family.

Token use: QUSD will be used as a real-time, real-world, and crypto-world currency as well as for storing value.
name: QUSD
